mapper.sql: ID, AD_CLIENT_ID, AD_ORG_ID, ATTRIBCODE, ATTRIBNAME, ATTRIB_ENAME, M_DIMDEF_NEW_ID, DIMFLAG, OWNERID, MODIFIERID, CREATIONDATE, MODIFIEDDATE, ISACTIVE, SORTING, SECURITYTYPE, DOSTANDARD, CODE
mapper.select: SELECT id,attribcode,attribname FROM M_DIM_NEW WHERE ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND DIMFLAG = #{dimFlag} and I_DEFAULT = 'Y'
SELECT id,attribcode,attribname FROM M_DIM WHERE ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND DIMFLAG = #{dimText} and I_DEFAULT = 'Y' ORDER BY ORDERNO DESC
SELECT id,attribcode,attribname FROM M_DIM WHERE ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND DIMFLAG = #{dimText} and I_DEFAULT = 'Y' ORDER BY ORDERNO DESC
mapper.insert:
select SEQ_M_DIM.nextval from dual
insert into M_DIM_NEW (ID, AD_CLIENT_ID, AD_ORG_ID, ATTRIBCODE, ATTRIBNAME, ATTRIB_ENAME, M_DIMDEF_NEW_ID, DIMFLAG, OWNERID, MODIFIERID, CREATIONDATE, MODIFIEDDATE, ISACTIVE, SORTING, SECURITYTYPE, DOSTANDARD, CODE) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{adClientId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{adOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{attribcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribEname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mDimdefNewId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dimflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{modifierid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creationdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifieddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isactive,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sorting,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{securitytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dostandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

mapper.update:
update M_DIM_NEW
AD_CLIENT_ID = #{adClientId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AD_ORG_ID = #{adOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ATTRIBCODE = #{attribcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBNAME = #{attribname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIB_ENAME = #{attribEname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
M_DIMDEF_NEW_ID = #{mDimdefNewId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DIMFLAG = #{dimflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OWNERID = #{ownerid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MODIFIERID = #{modifierid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATIONDATE = #{creationdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFIEDDATE = #{modifieddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ISACTIVE = #{isactive,jdbcType=CHAR},
SORTING = #{sorting,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SECURITYTYPE = #{securitytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOSTANDARD = #{dostandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update M_DIM_NEW set AD_CLIENT_ID = #{adClientId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AD_ORG_ID = #{adOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ATTRIBCODE = #{attribcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBNAME = #{attribname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIB_ENAME = #{attribEname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, M_DIMDEF_NEW_ID = #{mDimdefNewId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DIMFLAG = #{dimflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OWNERID = #{ownerid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MODIFIERID = #{modifierid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATIONDATE = #{creationdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFIEDDATE = #{modifieddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISACTIVE = #{isactive,jdbcType=CHAR}, SORTING = #{sorting,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SECURITYTYPE = #{securitytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOSTANDARD = #{dostandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE = #{code,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select to_char(g.t_day_day,'yyyy-MM-dd') from (SELECT t.t_day_day FROM t_day t WHERE t.t_day_date >= to_number(to_char(sysdate+9,'yyyyMMdd')) AND t.t_day_day_of_week = 2 order by t.t_day_date)g where rownum < 2
SELECT GET_DATAJSON(1) AS jsonstr FROM dual

if.test: mDimNew14Id != null and mDimNew15Id != null and mDimNew16Id != null

select.if: SELECT GET_PZSJSON(#{flag}, #{productId}, #{mDimNew14Id},#{mDimNew15Id},#{mDimNew16Id}) AS pzJsonstr FROM DUAL
SELECT GET_PZSJSON(#{flag}, #{productId}, #{mDimNew14Id},null,null) AS pzJsonstr FROM DUAL
SELECT GET_PZSJSON(#{flag}, #{productId}, #{mDimNew14Id},#{mDimNew15Id},null) AS pzJsonstr FROM DUAL

mapper.select: SELECT '{''yc'':'''||t.yc_value||''',''jk'':'''||t.jk_value||''',''xc'':'''|| NVL(t.xc_value,'-') ||''',''hzxcValue'':'''||t.hzxc_value||'''}' as jsonstr FROM B_CUSMPTCATEITEM t,B_CUSMPTCATE a,m_product b, m_product_dim c WHERE t.b_cusmptcate_id = a.id AND a.m_product_id = b.id AND b.id = c.m_product_id AND c.isactive = 'Y' AND c.isdefault = 'Y' AND b.name = #{pdt} AND t.xw_value = #{xwValue}

SELECT nvl(a.totalAmount,0) totalAmount, nvl(a.qty,0) as qty, b.GH_PRICE as ghPrice, b.FL_PRICE as flPrice, c.c_storetype_jz_id as storeType, decode(c.c_storetype_jz_id,8,a.totalAmount*b.gh_price - nvl(b.fl_price,0)*nvl(a.qty,0),7,a.totalAmount*nvl(b.gh_price,0)) as afterAmount FROM V_DATA_ANALYSIS a, M_RANGE b, c_store c WHERE a.jgno = c.code AND c.id = b.c_store_id AND a.qty between b.star_sum and b.end_sum AND a.jgno = #{code} AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT nvl(a.totalAmount,0) totalAmount,nvl(a.qty,0) as qty,c.c_storetype_jz_id as storeType FROM V_DATA_ANALYSIS a, c_store c WHERE a.jgno = #{code} AND a.jgno = c.code AND c.isactive = 'Y' AND ROWNUM = 1
SELECT DISTINCT ATTRIBNAME FROM CL WHERE ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND ATTRIBNAME IS NOT NULL
select comments from AD_LIMITVALUE where ad_limitvalue_group_id = 10222 and value = #{customer}
